remarks: Associativity of sum and difference of Hilbert space operators. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hoaddsubass.1 $e |- R : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubass.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubass.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubassi $p |- ( ( R +op S ) -op T ) = ( R +op ( S -op T ) ) $.
